Begin by creating a new coordinate system with the euler angles set to [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] and the translation vector set to [0.0, 0.0, 0.0]. Then, transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the euler angles and translation vector from the coordinate system. Finally, extrude the 2D sketch along the normal by 0.0376 units to create the 3D model. The operation is to create a new solid body. The length of this part is approximately 0.75 units, the width is also approximately 0.75 units, and the height is 0.0376 units.</description>
